About Me

BIO

Being exposed to the web development technologies during my academic years in Finland, I was immediately fascinated and has been constantly improving my skillset in the field. I care about UI, UX and code best practices. Having strong knowledge of front-end development, my plan in the near future is to continue exploring the field of back-end and become a system architect. A few job placements in recent years definitely helped me grow faster as a developer.

Celenum Oy (Helsinki, Finland)

Front-end Specialist

In charge of the front-end architecture of a modern social media application for pet owners and breeders. The app was set up to use React-Redux for building robust, scalable UI.

KMS Technology (HCM, Vietnam)

Software Engineer Intern

The first job in a real-life project where I get to learn a lot about full-stack development with NodeJS, React-Redux, MongoDB, gRPC. Main tasks were to build UI components and create new APIs, work with database.
